name: Unordinary Guys
description:
A young kid finds his life to be rough and difficult. Not until he sees many Unusual People wearing random costumes with wild personalities.

Controls for Keyboard / Mouse /  Mobile / PlayStation or Xbox Controller

Movement:Arrow KeysLeft ClickTapDirectional Buttons or Left Analogue StickInteract:Z ButtonLeft ClickTapX / AFast Forward:F Button  Menu/Cancel:X ButtonRight ClickTap Twice at the Same TimeMenu: Triangle / Y - Cancel: Circle / B
